snippet: Getting the resources required to handle the millions of families navigating the immigration bureaucracy and justice system is the next crisis coming.
abstract: Editorial warns that Pres Obama's executive actions on immigration will worsen problem of critical shortage of lawyers and other legal assistance for those navigating immigration bureaucracy and justice system; asserts it will be up to states, cities and advocates to provide money to help unauthorized immigrants with legal issues; praises efforts by New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio to strengthen legal and other services for immigrants.
lead_paragraph: Getting the resources required to handle the millions of families navigating the immigration bureaucracy and justice system is the next crisis coming.

headline.main: On Immigration, a Huge Job Ahead
headline.print_headline: On Immigration, a Huge Job Ahead
